nodes.text: A prince, or feminine equivalent princess, was a member of a noble family, especially the son or daughter of a king or queen. A prince or princess was generally preordained to succeed his or her reigning parent as the sovereign.

Roola was a Hutt princess who ruled the moons of Syvris before she was kidnapped by the Hutt gangster Pashda, who had been contracted by the Mon Calamari Basz. Although she was the daughter of a defrocked Jedi Knight and a senator of humble origins, Leia Organa became a princess following her adoption into the Royal Family of Alderaan. In later years, Organa would eschew the title of princess in favor of the role of general in the Resistance against the First Order, allowing only her close friends to use the title. In fact, the title no longer carried much political weight in a New Republic determined to uphold democratic ideals.
